### Attrition Prediction on IBM HR Data

::: {.project-tech}
Python · scikit-learn · pandas · causal framing
:::

Predicting employee attrition using the IBM HR Analytics dataset. The focus is on
interpretability and causal framing — not raw accuracy. Compares logistic regression,
random forest, and doubly-robust estimation, with SHAP-based explanations.

### Double ML for HR Program Evaluation

::: {.project-tech}
R · DoubleML · tidyverse · causal inference
:::

Estimating the causal effect of HR interventions (training programmes, compensation changes)
using the Double Machine Learning framework. Includes a practical walkthrough with simulated
HR data and sensitivity analysis via partial identification.
